updates.title: Resolve timeout-strike handling for round progression
updates.content:
Resolve timeout-strike handling for round progression

Commit: 4a7662f

Refine timeout policy with `MULTIPLAYER_TURN_TIMEOUT_STAND_STRIKE_LIMIT`, introducing auto-stand to observer mode after repeated timeouts in the same round. Amend related game state synchronization and UI notifications to support forced observer transitions on timeout strikes.
